id.value: Add HAWK Key to OAuth2 Token Response

name="scopesMustMatch" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Bearer" name="accessTokenType" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="54" name="accessTokenlength" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="3600" name="accessTokenExpiresInSecs" type="long"/> <!-- refreshChoice can be NewRefresh, NoRefresh, PreserveRefresh - with NewRefresh as a default. --> <field cardinality="1" default="NewRefresh" name="refreshChoice" type="string"/> <field cardinality="1" default="46" name="refreshTokenlength" type="integer"/> <field cardinality="1" default="43200" name="refreshTokenExpiresInSecs" type="long"/> <field cardinality="1" default="true" name="recordOutboundTxns" type="boolean"/> <field cardinality="1" default="Application" name="scopeChoice" type="string"/> <!-- Callout to a circuit and validate the OAuth scopes --> <field cardinality="?" name="scopeCircuitPK" type="@FilterCircuit"/> <!-- --> <field cardinality="?"
